text:
Upgraded to Apache 2.0.51 from 2.0.50 a few days ago.  After the upgrade it 
appeared that not all of the password protected areas took hold.  I restarted 
the Apache service and all was dandy.  Everything seemed fine for a couple 
days but when I came in this morning not all folders were being protected as 
they should.  I restarted the service and that seemed to fix it.  I went to a 
meeting and when I came back an hour later folders were once again unprotected.
creator: gbadine@csub.edu
gbadine@csub.edu
text:
Just came back from lunch (about an hour after last service restart) and 
directories were not protected.

creator: jorton@redhat.com
text:
There is a regression in 2.0.51 in Satisfy merging, please try this patch:

http://cvs.apache.org/viewcvs.cgi/httpd-2.0/server/core.c?r1=1.285&r2=1.286

creator: gbadine@csub.edu
text:
Thanks Joe.

Are there plans to reflect this fix the binary for 2.0.51 or 2.0.52?
